title: Optimising rune pages and mastery pages
body:
Why can't we re-order mastery and rune pages? forced instead to redo for example, 10, in order to move 1 page to the top.
*Edit: for clarification, moving actual pages, not mastery points (i.e. move all my support pages together, all my jungle pages together etc)

Also, I think it would be nice if we could equip and unequip multiple runes at a time, for example, hold shift and right click to add/remove 9 of the same rune.

Opinions?

replies.body: I'm kinda OCD, i need this
You can do exactly what you described lol. If you want to change one of the first masteries, just click on the one you want. It will move over without effecting the rest in the tree

As in re-arranging mastery/rune pages?
As far as I'm concerned there's no way to do that yet.
Ok i didnt realize you meant pages rather than points
